title: SOLD: FS T3 Turkey Red Home Run Baker
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: SOLD: FS T3 Turkey Red Home Run Baker
posts.post_content:
The card has been SOLD. Thank you.

Hi,

I have a T3, Turkey Red, card of Home Run Baker for sale. It is a beautiful card that has great eye appeal. However, I am told that the card has been re-colored. I can't see it. But I am disclosing this because the card will probably not get a numerical grade from PSA or SGC. However, if you want a beautiful Turkey Red of this Hall of Famer for a fraction of the price, then this is a very nice card.

The price is $300 delivered. You can contact me either through the Net 54 E-mail or directly at [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Here is the link to view the card:

[url]http://www.cyscards.com/t3/03-078.htm[/url]

Thanks.

Cy
[url]www.cyscards.com[/url]
Looks awesome.  Let me know payment details.
